name: Beethoven-x Joint Provider
description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a Liquidity Boot Strapping Pool on [Beethoven-x](https://beets.fi) which dynamically adjusts the pool's weights to limit Impermanent Loss while earning BEETS and fees. Rewards are harvested, divided between the pairs, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.
